00017 //! \addtogroup wall_clock

00020 
00021 //! Class for measuring time intervals
00022 class wall_clock
00023   {
00024   public:
00025   
00026   inline  wall_clock();
00027   inline ~wall_clock();
00028   
00029   inline void   tic();  //!< start the timer
00030   inline double toc();  //!< return the number of seconds since the last call to tic()
00031   
00032   
00033   private:
00034   
00035   bool valid;
00036   
00037   #if defined(ARMA_USE_BOOST_DATE)
00038     boost::posix_time::ptime         boost_time1;
00039     boost::posix_time::time_duration boost_duration;
00040   #else
00041     #if defined(ARMA_HAVE_GETTIMEOFDAY)
00042       struct timeval posix_time1;
00043       struct timeval posix_time2;
00044     #endif
00045   #endif
00046   
00047   };

00050 //! @}
